column3: Latest;Siem Reap: A body was found at 6:30 am on 31st August 2019 at Nokorpor Village
column6: Siem Reap Province.------The dead man was named as Meas Nim
column12: Siem Reap Province.------It is believed he was very drunk and fell into the water.------After the incident
column13: authorities performed an autopsy and concluded that the victim died from drowning
column14: with no signs of murder and handed the body to the family. ------AREY NEWS
